---
category: news
title: "Automation Leader UiPath Bolts On Text Mining Startup Re:infer"
excerpt: "New York-listed automation company UiPath announced, on August 1, 2022, that it had acquired Re:infer, a natural language processing (NLP) startup based in London for an undisclosed amount. UiPath specializes in robotic process automation (RPA) technology and offers a cloud-based platform that allows businesses to automate operational activities."
